title: Song of the Lioness
description: Classic fantasy. This is a 4 in 1 hardback book by Tamora Pierce. It includes Alanna: The First Adventure, In the Hand of the Goddess, The Woman Who Rides Like a Man, and Lioness Rampant. This is a book for children and young adults, following the story of a young girl who wants to become a knight. We follow her training, her attempt to hide her gender from her fellow trainees, and her adventures after she becomes a knight.
author: Tamora Pierce
